page.title: 16An Eleven Year Old's Day
page.content: I get up at 6.15 am.I have my breakfast at 7.00 am which is usually cereal.I watch a cartoon at 7.25 am. I go to school at 8.15 am.School starts at 8.55 am.We do some work for ten minutes and then have assembly until 9.40 am.At 9.40 am we do either English or Maths.In English we usually write out a story and in Maths we do four rules of number.At 10.30 am we have a playtime in the playground until 10.45.We come back in and finish any work off until 11.55 am when we have dinner.I usually have sandwiches. After dinner we have P.E. lessons. After that we finish off any work that is started.At 3.15 pm the bell goes and we go home.When I get home I usually watch television.
